titleStmt.title: An ansvver to the Call to humiliation: or, A vindication of the Church of England, from the reproaches and objections of W. Woodward, in two fast sermons, preach'd in his conventicle at Lemster, in the county of Hereford, and afterwards published by him.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Robinson Junior, book-seller in Ludlow,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Identified on UMI microfilm (Early English books, 1641-1700) reel 1754 as Wing (2nd ed.) A3394A.
